name: The World Must Burn
description:
Fast paced puzzle platformer where you try to burn everything.

AWSD or arrow keys to move
SPACE - jump
LEFT SHIFT - dash
E or LEFT MOUSE KEY to shoot

This started as a school project but evolved to solo project afterwards. 
I have been working this every now and then. 
None of the audio is mine. 

 

Music by Eric Matyas www.soundimage.org
Audio effects, Freesound, YleArkisto
